item.title: Fake clicks and pageviews can artificially boost digital marketing metrics
item.description:
You’ve invested in online ads on a platform known for its excellent results, and you’re seeing those clicks increase week after week. People are clearly interested enough to visit your store locations, but actual sales remain stagnant. So, what’s the deal? This could be a sign of ad fraud, and not necessarily originating from the platform itself. The Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB), based in the US, emphasizes the need for greater awareness surrounding non-intentional traffic...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fake-clicks-and-pageviews-can-artificially-boost-digital-marketing-metrics/
